work.name: Megvii, Embodied AI Group
work.summary: Topics: Embodied AI, Sim2Real, Robot Manipulation
highlights: Developed screw-driving task in Isaac Sim, enabling evaluation and training of policies
Collected and preprocessed 2k+ trial data for training a VLA (vision-language-action) model
Applied domain randomization in simulation to enhance robustness of UR5 robot manipulation

work.name: UESTC, Data Intelligence Group
work.summary: Research Topic: Image Super-resolution, Meta Learning, Few-shot Learning
highlights: Proposed and implemented a meta-learning-based method for image super-resolution
Designed dynamic weighting strategy to emphasize rare high-frequency samples
Improved PSNR in tail domains on Urban100 dataset
